title: AE插件：特殊编码加速输出渲染插件 Aescripts AfterCodecs v1.1.2 + 使用教程
author: 大众脸
content: AfterCodecs 是一款专为 Adobe After Effects 设计的编码输出插件，支持输出 H264、H265 和 ProRes 等高质量编码格式。相比 AE 自带的输出功能，该插件渲染速度更快，生成的文件体积更小，同时保持更佳画质。它特别适用于需要高效输出专业视频格式的用户，例如支持带 Alpha 通道的 ProRes 444，以及针对高分辨率优化的 x264/x265 编码。

update_notes: Added a “AfterCodecs AV Muxing” Dialog at the end of the render
Added encoder metadata to ProRes with AfterCodecs’ and ffmpeg’ version (e.g., “ProRes HQ (AFC 1.1.2 3.2.2)”), visible in AE and Premiere Pro
Added fast decode for x264 / x265 when resolution > HD
Preview text under “Format Options” now shows a brief description of chosen encoding parameters (e.g., “x264 Q75 (Streaming)”)
The encoding window is no longer always on top
Prevents overwriting files with the same name before rendering, prompting user to rename, overwrite, or cancel

supported_codecs.x264: Best H264/AVC implementation, outperforming Adobe Media Encoder, QuickTime H264, and AE’s built-in H264
supported_codecs.x265: Files are 30% lighter than x264 and support 8K resolution
supported_codecs.x264 RGB: Avoids YUV colorspace; ideal for storing separate channels (e.g., UV map, Alphas); for power users only
